divs: sighting detailsit was my brothers birthday a couple of days ago so we chucked him a party yesterday and there were about 30 there and my brother and 3 of his friends went outside because one of my brothers friends were drunk so they waited outside to get a taxi to come and while they did i came outside to and im under 18 and i didn't drink when i saw this light bit bigger than a pea in a yellow\white colour fall from about tree top hight and i watched it for about 3 seconds until it went behind houses at 8:23pm , it could of been a shooting star, comet or something but if it was in the atmosphere which i think cause it looked really close about 15 houses away this thing could of landed but that makes me think it could of been a cracker or firework but i didn't hear and noise or nothing but i don't have a clue what it is. thanks.
